text: Inah Canabarro Lucas (also known as Sister Inah; 8 June 1908 - 30 April 2025) was a Roman Catholic nun and supercentenarian from Brazil who has been the world's oldest living person since the death of Tomiko Itooka on 29 December 2024. She was also the world's oldest living nun follwing the death of Lucile Randon on 17 January 2023. Canabarro Lucas died on 30 April 2025 at the age of 116. == Ranking == * January 2, 2022 - at the age of 113 years, 208 days, Inah Canabarro Lucas surpassed the age of Luzia Mohrs to become the oldest Brazilian ecclesiastical person ever. * January 23, 2022 - Antonia da Santa Cruz died.
